original_title: ロマンチックジャーニイ　旅立ち
overview: A salaryman, Aisuke, was molested by an older man on a crowded commuter train. He couldn't forget the excitement and started looking for the man every morning. When he finally finds the man, he tells him that he doesn't know anything about him, but he's not convinced, so he follows him...
tagline: The 0:10 p.m. train is full of homosexuals and homoeroticism. A beautiful boy takes off his panties.
title: Romantic Journey: Departure
